channel.title: It's the 21st in NZ &c. — Game Chef 2019 is live!
channel.description:
**Game Chef** is a yearly ttrpg design contest where you're given one theme, four ingredients, and nine days* to make a new analogue game.
It's something I've entered quite a few times, largely for composting of ideas, but having brought some good success with *Contempt for the Ogre-Poet* (2016? finalist) and *EXUVIAE* (since expanded into a physical product).
This years theme is ```AMALGAM``` and the ingredients are: - failure - microscopic - levitate - secret
http://www.game-chef.com/
* deadline is the 30th, Hawaii time
